NK037(ji)016:0: re t+ai rang byung rgyal mo'i sgrub thabs dbang chog dang bcas pa bzhugs /
NK037(ji)016:2: ye shes dbyings las gdul daka'i 'gror //
NK037(ji)016:3: drag mor cher khros re ma t+ai //
NK037(ji)016:4: rang byung rgyal mo phur pa'i lhar //
NK037(ji)016:5: btud nas de yi sgrub thabs bshad //
NK037(ji)016:6: 'dir phur srung bdag nyid ma bzhi'i dang po re
NK037(ji)016:7: ma t+ai'i sgrub thabs dang 'brel bar rjes gnang sgrub
NK037(ji)016:9: sbyor ba yo byad kyi bshom /
NK037(ji)016:10: dngos gzhi sgrub pa'i thabs dang rjes gnang gi cho ga'o //
NK037(ji)016:12: dur khrod la sogs pa dben pa'i gnang su dus
NK037(ji)016:13: khyad par can la yi dam dang 'di'i bris sku
NK037(ji)016:14: bkram pa'i mdun du stegs bu gru bzhi pa'i khar
NK037(ji)016:15: / chos 'byung lte ba dmar nag kha khyer ljang
NK037(ji)016:16: gu zla gam khrag mtsho thod phreng dang me ris
NK037(ji)016:17: zlum por bskor ba'i dbus su 'bru nag gi tshom
NK037(ji)016:18: / bu dgod / der thod pa'am lcags snod du
NK037(ji)016:19: gtor ma gru gsum mi dbang gi sha khrag sogs
NK037(ji)016:20: dam rdzas kyis brgyan pa la /
NK037(ji)016:21: mda' dar nag po dang sku rten tsaka li gtsugs /
NK037(ji)016:25: gzhan yang rdor dril d+aa ru g.yab dar sbyar spos
NK037(ji)016:26: sogs nyer mkho'i yo byad thams cad tshogs par bya'o
NK037(ji)016:28: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa yi dam khro bo
NK037(ji)016:29: gang 'os kyi bdag bskyed bzlas pa dang bcas pa
NK037(ji)016:30: sngon du 'gro bas mchod gtor byin gyis brlab /
NK037(ji)016:31: rang gi mdun du 'od kyi gur khang sngon po
NK037(ji)016:32: rgya khyon mtha' med pa'i nang du me rlung 'tshubs
NK037(ji)016:33: ma 'khyil ba'i dbus rak+ta'i rgya mtsho rba klong 'khrug
NK037(ji)016:34: pa'i nang du phyi gnam lcags 'bar ba'i gzhal yas
NK037(ji)016:35: khang gru bzhi nang thod pa brtsigs pa'i sku mkhar
NK037(ji)016:36: rmang rdo rje pha lam las grub pa'i dbus kyi
NK037(ji)016:37: gzhir khrag zhag 'khrug cing dbugs bral brtsegs pa'i steng
NK037(ji)016:38: du rang gi snying ga nas spros pa'i t+ai yig
NK037(ji)016:39: yongs su gyur pa las lcags kyi drel rta rkang
NK037(ji)016:40: gsum rdzu 'phrul myur mgyogs rlung gi gshog pa can
NK037(ji)016:41: / zhing dang stag lpags kyi sga stan bswe sga
NK037(ji)016:42: dmar po sbrul nag gi gong rmed dang glo nan
NK037(ji)016:43: gser srab g.yu mthur can gyi steng du pad+ma dang
NK037(ji)016:44: / nyi ma la / slar yang snying ga nas
NK037(ji)016:45: spros pa'i ma yig sngo skya las rtse gsum mas
NK037(ji)016:46: mtshan pa'i 'phro 'dus lha mor gyur pa ni /
NK037(ji)016:47: nag mo ting lam ma ma dun tim ma b+h+yoh
NK037(ji)016:48: zhes brjod pas dpal ldan lha mo re ma t+ai
NK037(ji)016:49: sku mdog nag mo skem rid khro gtum bzod par
NK037(ji)016:50: dka' ba'i gzugs can zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma /
NK037(ji)016:51: zhal gdangs shing mche ba gtsigs pa /
NK037(ji)016:52: spyan gsum nyi ma ltar 'bar ba /
NK037(ji)016:53: ral pa kham nag gyen du bardzesa shing thur du
NK037(ji)016:54: grol ba la thod skam lnga'i cod pan dang gser
NK037(ji)016:55: g.yu mu tig sogs kyis brgyan pa /
NK037(ji)016:56: skra gseb nas dus bzhi'i lha mo spro ba /
NK037(ji)016:59: dar nag gi go zu 'ja' tshon ris can sbrul nag gi sgro gzungs btab pa gsol zhing /
NK037(ji)016:60: thod rlon gyi do shal 'phyang ba /
NK037(ji)016:61: snyan g.yas g.yon la sbrul dang seng ge 'phyo zhing dar gyi cod pan 'phur pa /
NK037(ji)016:62: lte bar nyi ma dang spyi bor zla ba tshes shing rma bya'i mdongs kyis mdzes pa /
NK037(ji)016:63: phyag bzhi g.yas kyi dang po kha t+w+aam rtse gsum pa dang /
NK037(ji)016:64: 'og ma na gnam lcags kyi phur bu 'dril zhing 'debs pa /
NK037(ji)016:65: g.yon gyi dang po na 'phrul gyi me long phyi zhing lta ba /
NK037(ji)016:66: 'og ma na sbrul nag gi zhags pa rdog cing 'phen pa /
NK037(ji)016:67: zhabs gnyis drel rta'i steng na btsan skyil gyis gnas pa /
NK037(ji)016:68: dre'u'i phyi sha la lcags kyi d+r+wa ba dang nad kyi rkyal pa btags shing /
NK037(ji)016:69: snga sha la tshon gyi gru gu 'phyang ba /
NK037(ji)016:78: srin mo'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pas bskor zhing
NK037(ji)016:79: ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las thams cad yid bzhin
NK037(ji)016:80: du sgrub pa la dgyes shing ngo 'thon du bzhugs
NK037(ji)016:81: par bsam la / gnas gsum du +aahmh'u dang /
NK037(ji)016:82: khyad par thugs kar pad zla la ma yig ting 'dzin sems dpa'i ngo bor bkod /
NK037(ji)016:83: rang gi thugs ka dang mdun gyi ma mo'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros /
NK037(ji)016:84: byang shar mu le mthing gi pho brang nas dpal
NK037(ji)016:85: ldan lha mo 'khor bcas spyan drangs par bsam zhing
NK037(ji)016:86: / b+h+yoh dpal ldan gnyan gyi re ma t+ai /
NK037(ji)016:87: khyod kyi spyi bo'i gtsugs rum nas //
NK037(ji)016:89: nag mo mi bzad cho 'phrul can //
NK037(ji)016:90: dus la bab kyi da tshur byon //
NK037(ji)016:91: e h+ye hi dza e a ra l+li hoh zhes tshar gcig dang /
NK037(ji)016:92: ma mo nag mo ting lam /
NK037(ji)016:93: ma mo nag mo dun ting b+h+yo dzahmh'u bam hoh
NK037(ji)016:94: nag mo dun b+h+yoh zhes brgya rtsa la sogs bzlas
NK037(ji)016:95: pas spyan drangs / thod rus dmar po gtams pa'i dkyil 'khor nas //
NK037(ji)016:96: lha srin dgu brgya bsnol ba'i gab rtse la //
NK037(ji)016:97: rdo rje ral gcig srid pa kun gyi yum //
NK037(ji)016:98: brjid cing 'gying ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs su gsol //
NK037(ji)016:99: trag rak+sha ma hi ku la pad+ma sa ma ya ti sh+tha lhan /
NK037(ji)016:100: tsan+d+ra s+aur+ya ti ra bam h'u /
NK037(ji)016:101: bskal pa mang po rang rgyud cher sbyangs pas //
NK037(ji)016:102: snying rje'i stobs kyis phan pa'i gzugs ston pa //
NK037(ji)016:103: bde gshegs rgyal ba'i bstan pa bsrung ba dang //
NK037(ji)016:104: gdug pa 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK037(ji)016:107: rak+mo dun ting ma ma ya ha hi /
NK037(ji)016:108: nag mo dun ting ma ma ha hi /
NK037(ji)016:109: zhes pa'i mthar ar+g+ham nas shap+da'i bar gyis thun mong gi mchod pa dang /
NK037(ji)016:111: b+h+yoh rdo rje ma mo re ma t+ai //
NK037(ji)016:112: khyod la mchod pa 'bul ba ni //
NK037(ji)016:113: mi dbang 'bras bu smin pa'i sha /
NK037(ji)016:114: tshal gyi shing thog skam po dang //
NK037(ji)016:115: shing lo rlung khyer sar ma lhung //
NK037(ji)016:116: 'chi kha'i tshal thig gri snying dang //
NK037(ji)016:117: nal bu'i sha khrag rgyal mtshan dang //
NK037(ji)016:118: bya lug smug nag la sogs pa //
NK037(ji)016:119: dam rdzas thams cad bu la yod //
NK037(ji)016:120: khyod kyi thugs dam bskang bar bgyi //
NK037(ji)016:121: sman sna bdun rtsi'i rgya mtshor 'khyil //
NK037(ji)016:123: gtor ma'i tshogs ni ri ltar brtsigs //
NK037(ji)016:124: a la la te bzhes su gsol //
NK037(ji)016:125: ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kh+aa hi /
NK037(ji)016:129: ma mo nag mo be ta li ku lu ku
NK037(ji)016:130: lu ha ha ma h+aa m+aam sa la kha ram
NK037(ji)016:131: kh+aa hi / ma h+aa rak+ta la kha ram kh+aa hi /
NK037(ji)016:132: ma h+aa tsit+ta la ma h+aa go ro tsa na
NK037(ji)016:133: ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta la zhes pa gsum
NK037(ji)016:134: mam bdun gyis gtor ma phul nas /
NK037(ji)016:135: ar+g+ham la sogs pas kyang mchod de /
NK037(ji)016:137: mkha' la dbang sgyur yid bzhin sprul pa'i sku //
NK037(ji)016:138: ya mtshan rmad byung lus la til mar byugs //
NK037(ji)016:139: dbang phyug nag mo gsang ba'i re ma t+ai //
NK037(ji)016:140: nag mo stong gi gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK037(ji)016:143: dpal ldan lha mo chen mo ni //
NK037(ji)016:144: srin po'i chung ma ral pa can //
NK037(ji)016:145: skye gnas rnam bzhi sgrol ba mo //
NK037(ji)016:146: nag mo 'bum gyi dbus na bzhugs //
NK037(ji)016:147: dbang phyug kun gyi gtso mo ste //
NK037(ji)016:148: khro mo kun gyi sprul pa yin //
NK037(ji)016:149: sangs rgyas kun dang sbyor ba'i yum //
NK037(ji)016:150: srin gsum za bar byed la bstod //
NK037(ji)016:151: khyod kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas //
NK037(ji)016:153: khyod kyi gsang ba'i b+ha ga nas //
NK037(ji)016:154: las kyi ma mo stong stong 'gyed //
NK037(ji)016:155: khyod kyi g.yas g.yon zhabs dag nas //
NK037(ji)016:156: pho nya stong phrag drug cu 'gyed //
NK037(ji)016:157: bdud dang lha 'dre ngan sems can //
NK037(ji)016:158: dgra bo ma lus 'dul bar mdzod //
NK037(ji)016:159: rtags dang mtshan ma myur du ston //
NK037(ji)016:160: gang la bya ba nor ra re //
NK037(ji)016:162: sgrub pa po la dngos grub stsol //
NK037(ji)016:163: ma ma snying khrag tshal pa dun dun ma b+h+yoh zhes bstod cing bskul lo //
NK037(ji)016:165: ma mo'i thugs kar bzla bya'i sngags kyis bskor ba /
NK037(ji)016:166: bdag gi thugs ka nas sngags kyi 'od zer mchod pa'i tshul du spros pas dgyes pa bskyed /
NK037(ji)016:167: de'i ma yig sngags phreng dang bcas pa'i 'od zer
NK037(ji)016:168: gyis ci 'dod pa'i phrin las rab 'byams thogs med
NK037(ji)016:169: du bsgrubs nas bdag gi thugs ka'i sa bon la
NK037(ji)016:170: thim pas ma mo'i mthu nus thams cad bdag gis
NK037(ji)016:172: trag rak+sha ma hi dun b+h+yo ma h+aa yak+sha t+ai
NK037(ji)016:173: k+sh+na k+aa l+ai dun b+h+yoh zhes pa yang snying bcu
NK037(ji)016:174: bdun par grags pa ste rjes gnang tsam la 'di
NK037(ji)016:175: kho na bzlas pas chog go //
NK037(ji)016:176: de ltar bzlas pa'i mthar slar yang mchod cing bstod pa'am /
NK037(ji)016:178: sngar bzhin sman raka gis mchod pa'i rjes nyid du bzlas pa byas nas /
NK037(ji)016:179: gtor 'bul bstod bskul dang bcas pa rjes su byas na yang zor yang bar 'gyur /
NK037(ji)016:180: gang ltar yang mthar gtor ma stob pa dang mchod bstod bzod gsol sogs spyi dang mtshungs par bya'o //
NK037(ji)016:181: gsum pa rjes gnang gi cho ga ni /
NK037(ji)016:182: sgrub mchod bshad ma thag pa bzhin byas la slob
NK037(ji)016:183: ma'i bya ba khrus dang phyag byas gral du 'khod
NK037(ji)016:185: mtshams sbyor ci rigs pa las /
NK037(ji)016:186: 'dir rgyal ba thams cad skyed pa'i yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i ngo bo /
NK037(ji)016:187: rang bzhin ye shes kyi snang cha bcom ldan 'das
NK037(ji)016:188: 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor yum ro langs
NK037(ji)016:189: ma dang gnyis su med cing /
NK037(ji)016:190: rnam 'gyur dam tshig gi ma mo re ma t+air
NK037(ji)016:191: bzhengs nas bstan pa'i bka' srung thams cad kyi gtso
NK037(ji)016:192: bor grub pa dpal ldan lha mo rang byung rgyal
NK037(ji)016:193: mor grags pa 'di nyid sngon bskal pa mang po'i
NK037(ji)016:194: gong rol du byang chub mchog tu thugs bskyed nas
NK037(ji)016:195: rim bzhin las dang smon lam gyi rnam par smin
NK037(ji)016:196: pa'i 'bras bu dus su sad pa las /
NK037(ji)016:197: deng 'dir 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug mar gyur
NK037(ji)016:198: cing ston pa sh+aakya thub pa'i bstan srung yongs kyi
NK037(ji)016:199: gtso bor dbang bskur ba 'di nyid kyi sngon gyi
NK037(ji)016:201: da lta gang la brten cing phrin las kyi mdzad tshul /
NK037(ji)016:202: ma 'ongs pa na zhing gang du 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur pa sogs /
NK037(ji)016:203: 'phags pa lha mo dpal chen mo lung bstan pa'i mdo dang /
NK037(ji)016:204: gser 'od dam pa mdo sde dbang po'i rgyal po dang /
NK037(ji)016:205: gser 'od mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba gnyis kyi
NK037(ji)016:206: le'u bcu drug pa dang bcu bdun pa gnyis dang
NK037(ji)016:207: bsdus pa'i le'u nyer gcig pa dang /
NK037(ji)016:208: khyad par lha mo nyid kyi sgos rgyud mkha' 'gro
NK037(ji)016:209: ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud sogs mdo rgyud du
NK037(ji)016:210: ma nas gsal bar bstan pas khungs dang zin so
NK037(ji)016:211: che zhing / sangs rgyas kun dngos rig 'dzin chen
NK037(ji)016:212: po pad+ma thod phreng sogs tshad mar gyur ba'i slob
NK037(ji)016:213: dpon chen po du mas bstan srung kun gyi mchog
NK037(ji)016:214: che zhing / tu basngagasa shing / mthu rtsal byin
NK037(ji)016:215: rlabs kyi mtshan kha gzhal du med pa de la
NK037(ji)016:216: che zhing / tu basngagasa shing / / slob dpon
NK037(ji)016:217: pad+mas mdzad pa'i ma mo'i srog sgrub rtsa ba dang
NK037(ji)016:218: che zhing / tu basngagasa shing / / / las mdel zor gyi sgrub pa /
NK037(ji)016:219: yang snying gnubs kyi man ngag sogs gter ma dang /
NK037(ji)016:220: phur srung bdag nyid ma re t+ai'i sgrub thabs lang lab ma sogs bka' ma ste /
NK037(ji)016:221: mdor na ma mo ma ltar brten pa /
NK037(ji)016:224: bran ltar brten pa'i tshul gyis /
NK037(ji)016:225: bsnyen sgrub las sbyor sogs rtsa ba'i gsal byed dgongs
NK037(ji)016:226: 'grel gyi man ngag zab cing rno ba ji snyed
NK037(ji)016:227: gcig bzhugs pa 'di'i dbang du byas na /
NK037(ji)016:229: lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo //
NK037(ji)016:230: grul bum dri za 'byung po dang //
NK037(ji)016:231: cir yang sprul pa'i rdzu 'phrul can //
NK037(ji)016:232: ming brgya ma la mtshan stong ma //
NK037(ji)016:233: zhes gsungs pas lha mo 'di grub na ye shes
NK037(ji)016:234: dang las kyi ma mo thams cad 'grub par 'gyur
NK037(ji)016:235: ba'i phyir / de nyid kyi rjes su gnang ba
NK037(ji)016:236: sgrub pa la slob dpon gyi bya ba rnams sngon
NK037(ji)016:237: ba'i phyir / du song / slob ma'i bya ba man+dala phul nas gsol ba gdab pa /
NK037(ji)016:238: rdo rje 'dzin pa dgongs su gsol //
NK037(ji)016:239: bdag ni 'gro la phan don du //
NK037(ji)016:240: brtse chen khyod la gsol 'debs kyi //
NK037(ji)016:241: ma lus rjes gnang bka' drin stsol //
NK037(ji)016:243: skyabs sems dang yan lag bdun pa gang 'os kyis tshogs gsog byas nas /
NK037(ji)016:244: rjes gnang dngos la phyi nang gsang gsum las /
NK037(ji)016:245: dang po yab la brten pa phyi'i rjes gnang ni /
NK037(ji)016:246: don dam byang sems kyi rang mdangs shu nya t+aa'i sngags brjod pa'i rkyen gyis /
NK037(ji)016:247: gnas khang rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dur khrod
NK037(ji)016:248: chen por slob dpon bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed
NK037(ji)016:249: por gsal ba'i bdun du pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan
NK037(ji)016:250: la slob bu bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed po
NK037(ji)016:251: sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
NK037(ji)016:252: khro gtum bzod par dka' ba'i nyams can dur khrod kyi chas kyi brgyan pa /
NK037(ji)016:254: g.yon sdigs mdzub dang bcas pas zhags pa 'dzin pa /
NK037(ji)016:255: gshin rje pho mo bardzisa pa'i ma he'i steng na
NK037(ji)016:256: zhabs gnyis dor stabs su bzhugs par mos su bcug
NK037(ji)016:257: / dpon slob gnyis ka'i spyi bor zla ba la dkar po /
NK037(ji)016:259: snying gar nyi ma la h+aum sngon po /
NK037(ji)016:260: de so so'i mtha' bskor du /
NK037(ji)016:261: a kro te ka ya man+ta h+aum phata /
NK037(ji)016:262: ces yig 'bru bcu gcig po so so'i kha dog can gyis bskor ba gsal btab /
NK037(ji)016:263: slob dpon la mos gus dung dung ba byas pas
NK037(ji)016:264: slob dpon gyi gnas gsum gyi +aahmh'u las 'od zer
NK037(ji)016:265: dkar dmar thing gsum 'phros slob bu'i gnas gsum gyi
NK037(ji)016:266: yi ge gsum la so sor sib kyis thim /
NK037(ji)016:267: lus ngag yid gsum gyi sdig sgrib dag /
NK037(ji)016:268: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs thob par mos nas /
NK037(ji)016:269: a kro bcu gcig pa nyid drag tu bzla zhing spos dang rol mo bya /
NK037(ji)016:270: de nas slob bus slob dpon gyi phreng ba la bzung ste sngags kyi rjes zlos kyang bya'o //
NK037(ji)016:271: des ni bkra shis shing dngos grub myur ba'i dgos pa yod do //
NK037(ji)016:272: gnyis pa yum la rten pa nang gi rjes gnang ni /
NK037(ji)016:273: sh+aakya seng ge'i bstan pa la //
NK037(ji)016:274: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas //
NK037(ji)016:275: sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir //
NK037(ji)016:276: dpal ldan lha mo nag mo yi //
NK037(ji)016:277: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub dang //
NK037(ji)016:278: dbang dang phrin las stsal du gsol //
NK037(ji)016:279: zhes lan gsum gyis gsol ba gdab /
NK037(ji)016:280: mdun gyi gtor ma'i gnas su 'od kyi gur khang
NK037(ji)016:281: sngon po rgya khyon mtha' med pa'i nang du sogs
NK037(ji)016:282: kyis lha mo sngar bzhin gsal btab /
NK037(ji)016:283: ye shes pa spyan 'dren bzhugs su gsol /
NK037(ji)016:284: phyag 'tshal mchod 'bul bstod pa rnams byas nas /
NK037(ji)016:286: slob dpon gyi thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis gtor ma lha mor gsal ba'i rgyud bskul /
NK037(ji)016:287: de las lha mo'i sku dpag tu med pa nyi
NK037(ji)016:288: zer gyi rdul 'khrigs pa'am rdo tshan la kha ba
NK037(ji)016:289: babs pa bzhin khyed rang gi spyi bor thim pas
NK037(ji)016:290: sku'i byin rlabs nus mthu thams cad thob par sgoms
NK037(ji)016:292: gtor ma mgo thog tu bzhag la /
NK037(ji)016:293: ma mo mkha' 'gro dam tshig can //
NK037(ji)016:294: ma bas byams shing srid bas brtse //
NK037(ji)016:295: grogs bas gdungs shing bran bas nyan //
NK037(ji)016:296: bka' sdod srung ma'i dbang thob shog /
NK037(ji)016:297: trag rak+sha ma hi dun b+h+yo ma h+aa yak+sha tik+sh+na k+aa l+ai dun b+h+yo /
NK037(ji)016:298: zhes pa'i mthar +aa be sha ya btags pa drag tu bzla zhing spos dang rol ma'i sgra sbyar /
NK037(ji)016:299: de bzhin du sngags sgra sgrog pa'i sku dang yig 'bru dpag tu med pa sngar bzhin byon /
NK037(ji)016:300: khyed rang gi mgrin par thim /
NK037(ji)016:301: gsung gi byin rlabs nus mthu thams cad thob par mos nas gtor ma mgrin par bzhag /
NK037(ji)016:302: ma mo mkha' 'gro sogs tshigs bcad sngags dang spos rol byas nas /
NK037(ji)016:303: sngags kyi bzlas lung gi slad gsol 'debs zlos //
NK037(ji)016:304: lha mo bdag gis bzung lags kyi //
NK037(ji)016:305: lha mos bdag la byin gyis rlobs //
NK037(ji)016:306: gtor ma lha mor gsal ba'i thugs kar nyi ma'i
NK037(ji)016:307: dkyil 'khor gyi steng du ma sngo skya'i mthar sngags
NK037(ji)016:308: phreng sngon po las gnyis pa chad /
NK037(ji)016:310: khyed rang rnams kyi zhal nas snying gar thim par
NK037(ji)016:311: sgoms shig byas la slob dpon gyi phreng ba la
NK037(ji)016:312: bzung ste sngags kyi rjes zlos kyang bya'o //
NK037(ji)016:314: dpal ldan lha mo'i gsung rig sngags kyi mthu nus
NK037(ji)016:315: dang byin rlabs thams cad da lta nyid du 'jug
NK037(ji)016:316: par gyur cig / yang gtor ma ma mor gsal
NK037(ji)016:317: ba'i thugs kar pad nyi la ma yig sngo skya
NK037(ji)016:319: de las 'ja' tshon lta bu'i 'od zer gyi tshogs
NK037(ji)016:320: dang ma mo'i sku dang phyag mtshan gyi rnam pa
NK037(ji)016:322: khyed rang gi snying gar thim mthar ma mo nyid
NK037(ji)016:323: kyang 'od kyi thig le mthing zhun lta bur zhu
NK037(ji)016:324: ba thugs ka'i ma la thim /
NK037(ji)016:325: de yang khyed rang gi snying gar thim pas thugs
NK037(ji)016:326: kyi byin rlabs nus mthu thams cad thob par mos
NK037(ji)016:327: nas gtor ma snying gar bzhag ste /
NK037(ji)016:328: ma mo mkha' 'gro sogs tshigs bcad sngags dang spos rol bya'o //
NK037(ji)016:329: gsum pa ngo sprod gtor ma la brten ba gsang pa'i rjes gnang ni /
NK037(ji)016:330: slar yang gtor ma skad cig gis lha mor gsal
NK037(ji)016:331: ba la byin gyis brlab pa'i bdud rtsis bran nas
NK037(ji)016:332: mchod pas dgyes shing thugs dam bskangs te /
NK037(ji)016:333: sngon gyi dam tshig rjes su dran pas bcol ba'i
NK037(ji)016:334: phrin las sgrub pa la dgyes shing ngo 'thon du
NK037(ji)016:336: bstod pa dang rtsa sngags brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
NK037(ji)016:337: bka' bsgo gnyer gtad kyi phrin las bcol ba spro
NK037(ji)016:338: ba dang bcas pas khas blangs nas 'od du zhu
NK037(ji)016:339: ba slob ma'i snying gar thim pas dbyer med du
NK037(ji)016:341: gtor ma'i gsham nas cha shas tsam dang nang mchod
NK037(ji)016:342: cung zad re byin pas ma mo'i sku gsung thugs
NK037(ji)016:343: yon tan phrin las kyi dngos grub thob par bsam
NK037(ji)016:345: de ltar gtor ma gnas gsum du bzhag nas dbang bskur bas sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs dang /
NK037(ji)016:346: slar dngos grub tu rol pas phrin las rnam bzhi'i dngos grub thob pa yin no //
NK037(ji)016:348: rjes dam tshig bsgrag cing khas blangs pa dang yon 'bul ba sogs spyi dang 'dra zhing /
NK037(ji)016:349: cho ga'i mjug gi bya ba gtor ma 'bul gtang
NK037(ji)016:350: rag bzod gsol la sogs pa ni gzhan dang 'dra'o
NK037(ji)016:351: // ye shes dbyings las rnam 'gyur rtsal //
NK037(ji)016:352: 'gag med srin mo'i tshul bzung nas /
NK037(ji)016:353: rdo rje theg pa'i bstan srung gtso'i //
NK037(ji)016:354: sgrub thabs srog gtad zab mo'o //
NK037(ji)016:355: 'dod khams dbang phyug re ma t+ai rang byung rgyal
NK037(ji)016:356: mo bka' gter gnyis ldan gyi sgrub thabs rjes gnang
NK037(ji)016:357: dang bcas pa'i le'u tshan gter chen 'gyur med rdo
